messages.content:
You are a JSON API. Reply ONLY JSON with keys:
{
  "appName": string,
  "homeTitle": string,
  "mainButtonText": string,
  "packageId": string | null,
  "permissions": string[],          // Android permission names
  "intentHost": string | null,      // deep link host like "example.com"
  "locales": string[]               // e.g. ["en","zh-rCN"]
}
做一个介绍兰博基尼历史上所有车型的安卓app，要有图片和文字介绍

message.content:
{
   "appName": "兰博基尼历史车型",
   "homeTitle": "兰博基尼历史车型",
   "mainButtonText": "开始探索",
   "packageId": "com.lamborghini.history",
   "permissions": [
      "android.permission.INTERNET",
      "android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE",
      "android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"
   ],
   "intentHost": "https://www.lamborghini.com",
   "locales": ["en", "zh-rCN", "zh-rTW"]
}
